statement: For the initial integration, only evidence-related lab UI endpoints should be implemented; experiment/runs endpoints from refactor-everything can be deferred to keep the surface minimal.
rationale: The request explicitly prioritizes window/evidence flow and a minimal UI surface derived from the original lab UI evidence pages.
keyAssumptions: Current integration focus is evidence flow, not full experiment lifecycle
UI work will reintroduce experiment features later
validationCriteria: UI can create/list windows and view evidence content without experiment endpoints
No unused lab endpoints are required by the UI routes
critiquePoints: Some UI components might assume experiment endpoints exist
Future work could require refactoring the lab facade again
questions: Do we need placeholder experiment endpoints to keep the UI stable?
Should window list include experiment association columns?
